author: SONIA PÉREZ D. / AP
title: Guatemala Says U.S. Deportations Are Driving a Spike in Coronavirus Cases
description: Guatemala's health minister said that deportees from the United States were driving up the country's COVID-19 caseload
content:
(GUATEMALA CITY) — Guatemala’s health minister said Tuesday that deportees from the United States were driving up the country’s COVID-19 caseload, adding that on one flight some 75% of the deportees tested positive for the virus.
